title: Super Spreader Pence, Borat Hits Different 10.27.20
itunes:title: Super Spreader Pence, Borat Hits Different 10.27.20
description:
In episode 744, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Marcella Arguello to discuss Mike Pence possibly having covid-19, the grocery store wars, vaccinating Santa Claus, Lil Pump endorsing Trump, Borat 2, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Members of Pence’s Inner Circle Test Positive for Coronavirus
  2. How did Trader Joe’s weather the pandemic better than Whole Foods?
  3. Trump Official Planned to Give Santa Claus Performers Early Access to Covid-19 Vaccine
  4. Trump Administration Shelves COVID-Vaccine Santa Clause
  5. Macy's cancels in-person Santa visits for holiday season
  6. A very Covid Christmas: Mall Santas will see kids from behind plexiglass snowglobes
  7. Lil Pump Endorses Donald Trump For President, Says 'F*** Sleepy Joe'
  8. ‘Borat 2’: The 17 Craziest Pranks, Ranked and Investigated
  9. WATCH: Lil Wayne - I Feel Like Dying (Flying Lotus Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
